channel.title: VulcanX 317 EoC PVM PvP Server! Brand New!
channel.description:
Welcome to the VulcanX 317 Advertisement! We are a brand new server looking for dedicated member! we are currently in the beta stage and are making adjustments. We are in need of dedicated staff and member/tester. Help us find any bugs and put your input in to help make the server great! Server made just today! come claim your spot! making a website soon and webclient will soon follow -Working Claws -Working AGS -Working Chaotics -Working bosses and prayers! -Working Staking and Dicing! -Hardly any bugs or glitches! -Working Dung! - Nomad - All Skills Working - Construction - Dungoneering - Summoning - Hunter - Good XP Rates - Good Drop Rates - New Server - New Economy - Miasmic Barrage Working - Easy, Medium, and Elite Tasks - Many Point rewards and sub-minigames for good items - Flawless PVM - Flawless PVP - Flawless Switching for Hybrid -Looking for staff! Skilling Works 100% Ckey Awards (500m casket, 1b casket, 1.5b, 2b) 14 Different Boss Teleports! Working Minigames Duel Arena Dupe Fixed Custom Items! (Steads, Etc.) Custom Skilling Area Announcements! (99's, rares, etc.) Double xp Weekend! 24/7 VPS w/ 99.99% Uptime Guarantee. All Specials Working All 25 Skills Fully Working And LOADS More. Awesome custom shops for PKP and VulcanX points! [img[url=http://postimg.org/image/sc3dxjgfh/]http://[img]http://s30.postimg.org/sc3dxjgfh/ags.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/h3p79r2lp/][img]http://s30.postimg.org/h3p79r2lp/bosses.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/5q2nyjs31/][img]http://s30.postimg.org/5q2nyjs31/claws.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/6ebihhqst/][img]http://s30.postimg.org/6ebihhqst/duel.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/7ygufvz71/][img]http://s30.postimg.org/7ygufvz71/Maul.png[/img][/url]][/img] Come join us at: http://www.filedropper.com/vulcanx
